item.title: About: #ABSee
item.description: What is the ABSee project? #ABSee is a @SketchTheDocs project that uses visual puzzles to build your tech IQ around concepts, products and people. It’s an experiment in game-based learning that airs as a weekly 5-minute segment on Hello World live. This is the same figure as the banner, but with alt-text added for accessibility. How does it work? Want to see the concept in action?

item.title: About: #HelloWorldLive
item.description: Hello World is a live 30-min news & edutainment show broadcast weekdays on Microsoft’s Learn TV. The A-B-See segment is a regular feature on the Thursday edition of the show, where I serve a dual role - as co-host (for the show) and producer (for the segment). You can find the show episodes along with show notes and other resources, on Channel 9 at https://aka.ms/helloworld. This site provides offsets for each segment - so if you have a favorite segment (cough ABSee *cough) you can zoom straight to that part of the show to catch up.
